jobDescription: Chief Data Scientist Mountain View, CA  GroundTruth, is a global location technology company that drives results with real data. We believe in the power of place. Build your brand, increase sales and more by building off what real people are doing in the real world, mapped using our proprietary Blueprints technology. GroundTruth currently serves 21 countries globally. Learn more: www.GroundTruth.com We are looking for a dynamic and proven chief data scientist to head our data science team.
